Manage your notifications¶

Select the Notifications drop-down menu from the global navigation menu to view important updates related to your account.

You can perform the following actions from the Notifications page:

1

Edit notification preferences

2

Search and view notifications

3

Perform additional actions related to this notification

4

Reply to a notification by creating a ticket

The following sections contain information about:

  • Manage account notifications
  • My notification preferences
  • Edit user notification preferences
  • Situation tickets
  • Interpret a situation ticket
